member.name: T:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Helpers.DesignerLibrary
member.summary: Helper class for platform detection.

member.name: T:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.ISimpleIoc
member.summary: A very simple IOC container with basic functionality needed to register and resolve instances. If needed, this class can be replaced by another more elaborate IOC container implementing the IServiceLocator interface. The inspiration for this class is at https://gist.github.com/716137 but it has been extended with additional features.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.ISimpleIoc.ContainsCreated``1
member.summary: Checks whether at least one instance of a given class is already created in the container.
member.typeparam: The class that is queried.
member.returns: True if at least on instance of the class is already created, false otherwise.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.ISimpleIoc.ContainsCreated``1(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether the instance with the given key is already created for a given class in the container.
member.typeparam: The class that is queried.
member.param: The key that is queried.
member.returns: True if the instance with the given key is already registered for the given class, false otherwise.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.ISimpleIoc.IsRegistered``1
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether a given type T is already registered.
member.typeparam: The type that the method checks for.
member.returns: True if the type is registered, false otherwise.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.ISimpleIoc.IsRegistered``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether a given type T and a give key are already registered.
member.typeparam: The type that the method checks for.
member.param: The key that the method checks for.
member.returns: True if the type and key are registered, false otherwise.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.ISimpleIoc.Register``2
member.summary: Registers a given type for a given interface.
member.typeparam: The interface for which instances will be resolved.
The type that must be used to create instances.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.ISimpleIoc.Register``2(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Registers a given type for a given interface with the possibility for immediate creation of the instance.
member.typeparam: The interface for which instances will be resolved.
The type that must be used to create instances.
member.param: If true, forces the creation of the default instance of the provided class.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.ISimpleIoc.Register``1
member.summary: Registers a given type.
member.typeparam: The type that must be used to create instances.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.ISimpleIoc.Register``1(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Registers a given type with the possibility for immediate creation of the instance.
member.typeparam: The type that must be used to create instances.
member.param: If true, forces the creation of the default instance of the provided class.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.ISimpleIoc.Register``1(System.Func{``0})
member.summary: Registers a given instance for a given type.
member.typeparam: The type that is being registered.
member.param: The factory method able to create the instance that must be returned when the given type is resolved.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.ISimpleIoc.Register``1(System.Func{``0},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Registers a given instance for a given type with the possibility for immediate creation of the instance.
member.typeparam: The type that is being registered.
member.param: The factory method able to create the instance that must be returned when the given type is resolved.
If true, forces the creation of the default instance of the provided class.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.ISimpleIoc.Register``1(System.Func{``0},System.String)
member.summary: Registers a given instance for a given type and a given key.
member.typeparam: The type that is being registered.
member.param: The factory method able to create the instance that must be returned when the given type is resolved.
The key for which the given instance is registered.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.ISimpleIoc.Register``1(System.Func{``0},System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Registers a given instance for a given type and a given key with the possibility for immediate creation of the instance.
member.typeparam: The type that is being registered.
member.param: The factory method able to create the instance that must be returned when the given type is resolved.
The key for which the given instance is registered.
If true, forces the creation of the default instance of the provided class.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.ISimpleIoc.Reset
member.summary: Resets the instance in its original states. This deletes all the registrations.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.ISimpleIoc.Unregister``1
member.summary: Unregisters a class from the cache and removes all the previously created instances.
member.typeparam: The class that must be removed.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.ISimpleIoc.Unregister``1(``0)
member.summary: Removes the given instance from the cache. The class itself remains registered and can be used to create other instances.
member.typeparam: The type of the instance to be removed.
member.param: The instance that must be removed.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.ISimpleIoc.Unregister``1(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the instance corresponding to the given key from the cache. The class itself remains registered and can be used to create other instances.
member.typeparam: The type of the instance to be removed.
member.param: The key corresponding to the instance that must be removed.

member.name: T:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.PreferredConstructorAttribute
member.summary: When used with the SimpleIoc container, specifies which constructor should be used to instantiate when GetInstance is called. If there is only one constructor in the class, this attribute is not needed.

member.name: T:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.SimpleIoc
member.summary: A very simple IOC container with basic functionality needed to register and resolve instances. If needed, this class can be replaced by another more elaborate IOC container implementing the IServiceLocator interface. The inspiration for this class is at https://gist.github.com/716137 but it has been extended with additional features.

member.returns: True if the instance with the given key is already registered for the given class, false otherwise.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.SimpleIoc.GetAllCreatedInstances(System.Type)
member.summary: Provides a way to get all the created instances of a given type available in the cache. Registering a class or a factory does not automatically create the corresponding instance! To create an instance, either register the class or the factory with createInstanceImmediately set to true, or call the GetInstance method before calling GetAllCreatedInstances. Alternatively, use the GetAllInstances method, which auto-creates default instances for all registered classes.
member.param: The class of which all instances must be returned.
member.returns: All the already created instances of the given type.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.SimpleIoc.GetAllCreatedInstances``1
member.summary: Provides a way to get all the created instances of a given type available in the cache. Registering a class or a factory does not automatically create the corresponding instance! To create an instance, either register the class or the factory with createInstanceImmediately set to true, or call the GetInstance method before calling GetAllCreatedInstances. Alternatively, use the GetAllInstances method, which auto-creates default instances for all registered classes.
member.typeparam: The class of which all instances must be returned.
member.returns: All the already created instances of the given type.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.SimpleIoc.GetService(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets the service object of the specified type.
member.exception: If the type serviceType has not been registered before calling this method.
member.returns: A service object of type .
member.param: An object that specifies the type of service object to get.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.SimpleIoc.GetAllInstances(System.Type)
member.summary: Provides a way to get all the created instances of a given type available in the cache. Calling this method auto-creates default instances for all registered classes.
member.param: The class of which all instances must be returned.
member.returns: All the instances of the given type.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.SimpleIoc.GetAllInstances``1
member.summary: Provides a way to get all the created instances of a given type available in the cache. Calling this method auto-creates default instances for all registered classes.
member.typeparam: The class of which all instances must be returned.
member.returns: All the instances of the given type.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.SimpleIoc.GetInstance(System.Type)
member.summary: Provides a way to get an instance of a given type. If no instance had been instantiated before, a new instance will be created. If an instance had already been created, that same instance will be returned.
member.exception: If the type serviceType has not been registered before calling this method.
member.param: The class of which an instance must be returned.
member.returns: An instance of the given type.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.SimpleIoc.GetInstanceWithoutCaching(System.Type)
member.summary: Provides a way to get an instance of a given type. This method always returns a new instance and doesn't cache it in the IOC container.
member.exception: If the type serviceType has not been registered before calling this method.
member.param: The class of which an instance must be returned.
member.returns: An instance of the given type.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.SimpleIoc.GetInstance(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Provides a way to get an instance of a given type corresponding to a given key. If no instance had been instantiated with this key before, a new instance will be created. If an instance had already been created with the same key, that same instance will be returned.
member.exception: If the type serviceType has not been registered before calling this method.
member.param: The class of which an instance must be returned.
The key uniquely identifying this instance.
member.returns: An instance corresponding to the given type and key.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.SimpleIoc.GetInstanceWithoutCaching(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Provides a way to get an instance of a given type. This method always returns a new instance and doesn't cache it in the IOC container.
member.exception: If the type serviceType has not been registered before calling this method.
member.param: The class of which an instance must be returned.
The key uniquely identifying this instance.
member.returns: An instance corresponding to the given type and key.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.SimpleIoc.GetInstance``1
member.summary: Provides a way to get an instance of a given type. If no instance had been instantiated before, a new instance will be created. If an instance had already been created, that same instance will be returned.
member.exception: If the type TService has not been registered before calling this method.
member.typeparam: The class of which an instance must be returned.
member.returns: An instance of the given type.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.SimpleIoc.GetInstanceWithoutCaching``1
member.summary: Provides a way to get an instance of a given type. This method always returns a new instance and doesn't cache it in the IOC container.
member.exception: If the type TService has not been registered before calling this method.
member.typeparam: The class of which an instance must be returned.
member.returns: An instance of the given type.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.SimpleIoc.GetInstance``1(System.String)
member.summary: Provides a way to get an instance of a given type corresponding to a given key. If no instance had been instantiated with this key before, a new instance will be created. If an instance had already been created with the same key, that same instance will be returned.
member.exception: If the type TService has not been registered before calling this method.
member.typeparam: The class of which an instance must be returned.
member.param: The key uniquely identifying this instance.
member.returns: An instance corresponding to the given type and key.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Ioc.SimpleIoc.GetInstanceWithoutCaching``1(System.String)
member.summary: Provides a way to get an instance of a given type. This method always returns a new instance and doesn't cache it in the IOC container.
member.exception: If the type TService has not been registered before calling this method.
member.typeparam: The class of which an instance must be returned.
member.param: The key uniquely identifying this instance.
member.returns: An instance corresponding to the given type and key.

member.name: T:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.EventToCommand
member.summary:
This can be used to bind any event on any FrameworkElement to an . Typically, this element is used in XAML to connect the attached element to a command located in a ViewModel. This trigger can only be attached to a FrameworkElement or a class deriving from FrameworkElement.
To access the EventArgs of the fired event, use a RelayCommand<EventArgs> and leave the CommandParameter and CommandParameterValue empty!

member.name: F:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.EventToCommand.CommandParameterProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property

member.name: F:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.EventToCommand.CommandProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property

member.name: F:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.EventToCommand.MustToggleIsEnabledProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property

member.name: P:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.EventToCommand.Command
member.summary: Gets or sets the ICommand that this trigger is bound to. This is a DependencyProperty.

member.name: P:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.EventToCommand.CommandParameter
member.summary: Gets or sets an object that will be passed to the attached to this trigger. This is a DependencyProperty.

member.name: P:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.EventToCommand.CommandParameterValue
member.summary: Gets or sets an object that will be passed to the attached to this trigger. This property is here for compatibility with the Silverlight version. This is NOT a DependencyProperty. For databinding, use the property.

member.name: P:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.EventToCommand.MustToggleIsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the attached element must be disabled when the property's CanExecuteChanged event fires. If this property is true, and the command's CanExecute method returns false, the element will be disabled. If this property is false, the element will not be disabled when the command's CanExecute method changes. This is a DependencyProperty.

member.name: P:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.EventToCommand.MustToggleIsEnabledValue
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the attached element must be disabled when the property's CanExecuteChanged event fires. If this property is true, and the command's CanExecute method returns false, the element will be disabled. This property is here for compatibility with the Silverlight version. This is NOT a DependencyProperty. For databinding, use the property.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.EventToCommand.OnAttached
member.summary: Called when this trigger is attached to a FrameworkElement.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.EventToCommand.GetAssociatedObject
member.summary: This method is here for compatibility with the Silverlight version.
member.returns: The FrameworkElement to which this trigger is attached.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.EventToCommand.GetCommand
member.summary: This method is here for compatibility with the Silverlight 3 version.
member.returns: The command that must be executed when this trigger is invoked.

member.name: P:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.EventToCommand.PassEventArgsToCommand
member.summary: Specifies whether the EventArgs of the event that triggered this action should be passed to the bound RelayCommand. If this is true, the command should accept arguments of the corresponding type (for example RelayCommand<MouseButtonEventArgs>).

member.name: P:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.EventToCommand.EventArgsConverter
member.summary: Gets or sets a converter used to convert the EventArgs when using . If PassEventArgsToCommand is false, this property is never used.

member.name: F:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.EventToCommand.EventArgsConverterParameterPropertyName
member.summary: The dependency property's name.

member.name: P:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.EventToCommand.EventArgsConverterParameter
member.summary: Gets or sets a parameters for the converter used to convert the EventArgs when using . If PassEventArgsToCommand is false, this property is never used. This is a dependency property.

member.name: F:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.EventToCommand.EventArgsConverterParameterProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: F:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.EventToCommand.AlwaysInvokeCommandPropertyName
member.summary: The dependency property's name.

member.name: P:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.EventToCommand.AlwaysInvokeCommand
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if the command should be invoked even if the attached control is disabled. This is a dependency property.

member.name: F:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.EventToCommand.AlwaysInvokeCommandProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.EventToCommand.Invoke
member.summary: Provides a simple way to invoke this trigger programatically without any EventArgs.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.EventToCommand.Invoke(System.Object)
member.summary:
Executes the trigger.
To access the EventArgs of the fired event, use a RelayCommand<EventArgs> and leave the CommandParameter and CommandParameterValue empty!
member.param: The EventArgs of the fired event.

member.name: T:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.IEventArgsConverter
member.summary: The definition of the converter used to convert an EventArgs in the class, if the property is true. Set an instance of this class to the property of the EventToCommand instance.

member.name: M:GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command.IEventArgsConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: The method used to convert the EventArgs instance.
member.param: An instance of EventArgs passed by the event that the EventToCommand instance is handling.
An optional parameter used for the conversion. Use the property to set this value. This may be null.
member.returns: The converted value.
